items.title: Apple Stock Rises Premarket: Analyst Sees ‘Ryder Cup Bethpage Moment’ For Cupertino On iPhone 17 Uptake Strength

items.title: Intel, Synopsys, CrowdStrike, Applied Materials, Seagate Lead S&P 500 Weekly Gains — But One Isn’t Overbought
items.description: Intel’s forward price-earnings (P/E) multiple is a hefty 139 times, notably higher than Nvidia’s 31 times, according to Koyfin.
